page.title: 14RELIGION.
page.content: ANGLICAN. St Peters Church is in St Peter Parish it was formed in 1848.The Church was build in 1866.The Vicar is Father B. Gadd.Paul Church in the Parish of Paul, was built in the 13th. century it was burned by the Spaniards in 1595 and then rebuilt the vicar is the Rev.G.Harper. The Royal National Mission to Deep Sea Fishermen is special too because there are only 18 in the country. The chapel has regular services and there is a superintendant Mr.Ray Hall. The Newlyn Circuit Minister is Mr Vidamore. He is in charge of 3 chapels which are Trinity, Centenery and Tredavoe. Trinity is the main chapel. It was built in 1832.There is one Apostolic Church in Newlyn.The Pastor is Mr.E.Parker.
